gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `EqualisationReserve` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `EqualisationReserve` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `ChangeInEqualisationReserve`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsEqualisationReserveMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EqualisationReserveEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsEqualisationReserveMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EqualisationReserveEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsEqualisationReserveMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EqualisationReserveStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsEqualisationReserveMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EqualisationReserveStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsEqualisationReserveMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ChangeInEqualisationReserve')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsEqualisationReserveMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ChangeInEqualisationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
